website_summaries.verdict: A large, sturdy stroller that is easy to control and comfortably seats four toddlers.
pros: Four padded seats and a design that easily folds up for storage
The canopy makes this stroller well-suited to hot or drizzly weather
Plenty of space below the seats for leg room or extra storage
cons: Some of the seams may come apart easily, though customer service is quick to respond

customer_reviews.title: Game changer.
customer_reviews.text: I walk everywhere. I also have 6 children 8 and under. This has made my life soooo much easier. Not only because I can easily contain 4 of them, but because I can also fit it through standard door frames, which means when I have to get a kid from school, I'm not chasing little ones around. We're in, out and done. Does this take bumps as well as a baby*rend sit and stand? No. It also will veer off towards any sloping a road or sidewalk has. But overall this stroller is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Not your Neuro-Typical family

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best child containment device ever. The kids can nap, play, share snacks and most importantly be contained to give me a break when we are at an amusement park or museum. It is huge and all the features were clearly created by someone with children. The hole for them to climb in and out of in amazing. The small change I would make in the next generation is to be able to lock/unlock the front wheels like a jogging stroller. Some times if you are pushing on uneven payment with 4 kids it gets a bit tough.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Love it! The best stroller ever!!
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome. Easy to push and maneuver. Plenty of room for kids, drinks, snacks, diaper bag. Seats remove easily in and out so one kid can sleep on the one side. Handlebar is comfortable on the hands. The brake works great. Perfect for our 3 boys under 2. The roof blocks the sun and so does the net that you can attach around it. Everything about this is great. Definitely worth buying. Everywhere we go, people ask where we got this and we tell them.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stroller/ wagon. It's the most convenient purchase I've made for my kids. I highly recommend this product if you have 2 or more small children. You won't regret the investment. We will be able to use this for years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Best wagon ever!! Great for traveling or even going for walks!
customer_reviews.text: Best wagon ever!! Great for traveling or even going for walks! Although a bit pricey it was well worth it. Easy to put together and fold away. Although u do have to pull out the seats, basket, and the canopy for it to fold properly it will still fit in most halway closets perfectly. We travel a bit n this works for us in more ways than i can think. It's even served as a play pen for my little ones. The seats seem sturdy and comfy. Lots of storage and we've even taken inside themeparks. We get soo many compliments as it seems and is very useful for parents with multiple little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Janett

customer_reviews.title: Great Wagon
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wagon. I have a 6yo, 4yo, and a 2yo and we do long walks to parks in are neighborhood, it works great. I do think they handlebar could be a bit higher...or adjustable to make it higher but other than that it’s great. For reference I am 5’7”. It is heavy but that is mostly because I have 100lbs of kids to push. I did purchase the snack tray which is nice to hold drinks and snacks. My kids love crawling out the bottom. They think it’s a secret door.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher1st

customer_reviews.title: For very young and small children only!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, study and sound seeming. I just got it tonight took a few minutes to put together and then went around my block. While empty, it turns fine. But with 3 children in it... it was very difficult to turn. Also the front wheels are simply too small to make nearly any uneven spaces. I had to get in front and lift several times. I wouldn’t want this for any kids older than 2/3 honestly. I was so hoping this would work for my handicap son. But if I can’t maneuver it without throwing out my back... what’s the point. 😭
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Page

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this wagon! Sturdy enough that I can use it for up to 6 Toddlers or just my own 2 kiddos (7 & 3). One of my daycare kiddos ripped the storage compartment by standing in it which was frustrating but not at all a design flaw as she weighs far more than what would normally go in there. The opening on the end is a back saver and a favorite feature. The only draw back is people will make comments whenever you take this thing out. I get stopped a lot and get asked multiple questions. Be prepared, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Josh mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great 4 seat stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is very easy to move, easy to fold up, easy to get the children in and out and the shade is awesome. The kids love it. Would like to have a car seat adapter and more cushion to the seats. The stroller is heavy but over all love it. We get stopped every time we are out by people asking where we got it from. And of course we tell them.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Stroller Family

customer_reviews.title: More cargo room than our BOB Dualie
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace our BOB Dualie. We have a 5 year old, 3 year old, and 2, 7-8 lb puppies. I wanted something that could handle all 4 on a walk. The Good: Capacity - Lots of space for kiddos, waters, coats, backpacks, etc., durable, canopy included, eye-catching, lots of people stop and ask us about it. The Bad: It does fine on paved, level surfaces, but dirt, sand or curbs are more challenging, especially the more weight you have in it. Like other reviewers have mentioned, I would def pay more for a 'sporty' version with bigger, inflated tires and maybe a suped up suspension system.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: with 1 uear old twins and a baby on the way I was super excited to get this based on reviews and recommendations. Now that it's here, I understand everyone's love for this thing. It is perfect. I've also learned there are several "hacks" to add storage, different covers a d different seat positions including for newborns. I guarantee we willbget YEARS of use out of this thing! Only downside is price but compared to a 3 kid stroller... not bad. I can't speak on durability yet but it seems very well made. It was easy to assemble. I did it on my own at 9 months pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: Although I love these wagons and bought three. Two for my daycare and one for my grandkids . The customer service is terrible. One had a defective basket and you cannot contact via telephone, you have to send an email. I sent the serial number, copy of invoice, photo of defective basket, etc., they have yet to contact me back regarding a replacement basket. Had I known their customer support was so bad I would have chosen another brand.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for large families
customer_reviews.text: This has fit through every doorway so far. I love that it seats four. Pros are the size, that it can be used as a pack n play, maneuverability, the side access panel, and space under seats for leg room (a definite plus). Cons are the weight (but what would you expect for a four seater), size when folded (it fills the entire back of the Suburban), no cup holders, no regular handle like the old wonderfold wagons to pull (this only had a strap). I also wish the storage bag on the handle bar end had a zipped lid like the old wonderfold wagon.
customer_reviews.author: Anna L

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best stroller, wagon, play pen we ever bought! Customer service is very understanding and helpful if you do have an issue. We get so many questions about it and everyone loves it. It takes up less room than any double stroller we had and even some of our single strollers. The wheels are great, the handle perfect. I seen some complain about having to take the handle of, but you just screw it in with four knobs so hasn't been an issue for us. The kids absolutely love it, I wish we heard about it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST WAGON EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS WAGON!!! I have 3 under 3 and this wagon allows me to take them out on my own. It is narrow enough that I can maneuver through department store aisles, but roomy enough that the kids are not crowded. It is easy for off roading through the parks and up hills. Storage under the seats is great and easily accessible from the zipper on the front. The canopy is adequate for shade and can be slid from the top to either side depending on the angle of the sun. It folds to fit in the car. It is a little on the pricey side, however it is worth every penny! I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: NMS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a large family!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously so amazing! With 4 kids 4 and under we needed something that was going to fit everyone! I have been through over 4 double strollers and NOTHING compares to this! It’s super easy to push and it fits in my Suburban perfect. I love the color because I can spot my husband with it in a crowd! It is absolutely worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I used the city select baby jogger and the wheels are much smoother when hitting bumps or anything really. This does need a good push to get over the jumps. However do not discredit this beauty. Space is amazing. The fact that you have a decent amount of storage. It fits my bulldog, three children and my diaper bag. We get compliments everywhere we go! It Is harder to put to close also would not fit in the back of a Ford Explorer 19 with all seats up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have with 3 kids!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a BEAST, but I’m so excited I have a way to contain my kids in public now. My kids are 6, 4, and 1 and fit perfectly inside. I love that I can use one of the bench seats and remove the other for my older kids to stand, sit, or lay. Plenty of storage under the seats and around the wagon. LOVE the moveable shade canopy as well. Worth the buy! Can’t wait to get several years of use out of this with the high weight capacity of 300#. If you’re a parent of 3+ JUST DO IT!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Bryley

customer_reviews.title: I love how versatile it is
customer_reviews.text: I love how you can move the seats so they are facing, or back to back. I love the “tunnel” as my kids call it, just makes it more exciting getting in. I ordered the extended handle bar from the website because I kept kicking the brake. I will be using this for a long time. After the kids don’t want to be pushed, I figure it is a nice place to stash our stuff whenever we go to an amusement park.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Remove the seats...and you have an instant playpen for kids and or PETS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 fur babies who love to go with us when we get out for some fresh air and sunshine. The normal size pet stroller does not accommodate 4 small fur babies. So we up sized to the Wonder fold stroller 4. We love it!!! Even our Veterinarian was impressed with it. We recently had to take all 4 for their yearly vaccinations. It was so easy with this stroller, and the nice part is that it keeps our little ones safely away from the bigger dogs or birds of prey, when we go out in public.
customer_reviews.author: Zura Luna

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the W4 for our triplets who no longer liked using a stroller. I like that the wagon can transport our girls safely using one item. The wagon is very easy to push and assemble. The wagon isn’t particularly heavy and folds easily. There is a quick removal of the handle and front wheel required to fit in my vehicle but the steps to complete the removal are very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Myschele

customer_reviews.title: Love it for the most part
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is perfect for multiple kids! Love the pack and play feature on the bottom. Seems very durable. Only thing I’m not a fan of is the lack of cup holders. For the price I really feel like they should be included not something you can buy separate. It’s not the easiest to fold up but it could be because it’s new and not use to folding down.
customer_reviews.author: Keel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my daycare! Easy to assemble, easy to maneuver, and spacious for kiddos! I had been looking for so long and came across this. I’m so happy I went with this over a 4 seater stroller
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to draw crowds with this rocking wagon!
customer_reviews.text: Pros- it’s amazing! Worth every penny and then some! Cons- like previous reviewer, you get stopped every 10 min because everyone wants to know where you got this amazing wagon. Seriously!
customer_reviews.author: Rob and Christie

customer_reviews.title: Your life just became easier!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It pushes easily and has worked very well on sand. Very easy to put together. Kids are very comfortable. I have a 11mo and 4 year old worked like a dream on our trip to Chicago. Be prepared for the stares and random strangers approaching you to ask about you swagon. My dislikes are that I wish the handlebar was adjustable aside from that it’s perfect. For tips and tricks follow me on IG:OneFancyMama
customer_reviews.author: OneFancyMama

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Too bulky, hard to move and cheaply made. Worst of all the seller was not professional.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for my special needs kiddo!
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is honestly one of the best purchases I've made for my kids. I have 3 kids (7, 3, and 2). My 3 year old is Autistic and we really needed a sturdy, secure way to help him experience the world. He loves it! He can crouch down on the floor of the wagon if things get too hectic and little sister can still sit strapped in and comfy eating her snacks. When we are in a busy, crowded place I dont have to worry about any if them wandering off and getting lost. Shopping is a breeze because there is plenty of space for cargo, kids, and so easy to push even when its loaded full.
customer_reviews.author: L. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller wagon EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has done wonders for me just in a short time. I have four children ages 11, 4, 2 and 2 1/2 months. Right now my baby can’t sit in a seat but my two toddlers can and I put the baby’s Boppy Newborn Lounger in the opposite side. This wagon has and does it all. It’s basically a pack n play on wheels with a zippered kid door and removable seats. Plus a ton of storage space! And the bearings in the wheels make it glide like a hot knife through butter. I love it! The only thing I’m not 100% happy with is that the canopy is not weatherproofed but I’ll be fixing that shortly!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Freedom but still safely confined!
customer_reviews.text: We love the w4! It has ample room for both my 2 year old twins. We went with the w4 because it provided more sleeping space than the w2 does for 2 kids. We love the option to allow our friends kids to ride along as well. It does get really hard to push with 4 kids in it. But still doable!
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Hicks

customer_reviews.title: In love!!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller wagon is amazing. I wanted to get this for my chunky boy so that he was more comfortable and was able to play instead of being strapped in a regular stroller. I only put one of the seat benches in (it comes with 2) and use the other side to let him sit on the bottom and play. It’s like a pack and play on wheels! He looks so happy and comfortable in it. The sides are tall enough I don’t have to worry about him falling over if he is standing up. This is so worth the money! I can’t wait to bring it everywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: got this for our kids who just had twins
customer_reviews.text: This is huge! has a great design. Wish it had bigger, rubber tires for gravel and rough roads, like going to fairs and such. There is lots of room, seems to hold up, and with 4 children, this is great! Easy to put together and though it is 50lbs, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: R2K Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! I have two twin boys and one daughter and i didn’t want to keep using two stroller so I decided to make the splurge and buy it honestly best idea so easy to put together and fold and use and my kids absolutely loved it great wagon/ stroller if you have multiple kids mine are 3&1 so they fit pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller hands down.
customer_reviews.text: We sold all of our other great ideas and bought this. We’ve had it for a week now and it’s AMAZING. Yeah, it’s pricey but it’s the only stroller you’ll ever need ever again. It’s a pack n play on wheels. Any say enough about it. If you’re on the fence, get it. Do it. Rip the bandaid off and get it done. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I have ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wagon! I have two younger children who love riding in the wagon when we go for walks and a 9 uear old who cant walk for long distances. Now she has a place to sit when she needs to rest and isnt embarrassed.it folds up nice and easy and fits in my trunk better then my double stroller. It also has great storage.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: BEST WAGON FOR YOUNG CHILDREN
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is amazing with multiple young children & is great quality. Check out my YouTube channel Mega Mom to see it unboxed & being used
customer_reviews.author: Zachary & Jena

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST purchase I’ve ever made! It’s absolutely amazing! I love that I can load up my three kids and feel safe wherever we go! I don’t hesitate to take them out and about by myself anymore! Plus, when my youngest(9 months) gets tired I just move the boys out so she can sleep peacefully on our adventures! The baby loves to use it as a rolling pack in play as well so she can watch her brothers( or people watch! Haha!)!
customer_reviews.author: Sanna Bettis Elza

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My son brother and nephew love this stroller even though they are all with in a year of each other my son and nephew really close in age apart my son is a lot taller then my nephew and almost past his uncle in height so it makes it hard for us to buy him strollers/wagons etc but this with it’s versatility fits the three of them quite well they all love the zipper flap they like the independents it offers. I live in Wyoming and so far so good on our ranch and city paved and not paved roads. Wish I know how to upload pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny we use it 3 times a week
customer_reviews.text: Great for on the parents works great love it worth every penny works great on the soccer field and everywhere else we take it not so great for small cars but just perfect for big trucks and SUVs it is bulky so check measurements before buying if you own a car if you have an suv you should be fine
customer_reviews.author: orlando

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for an on the go family!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble the wheels, and handle. It was also very easy to remove the 5 point harness straps as I will not need them. I love that my older two kids have access to crawl through so that they don't have to be lifted in. We often find ourselves out late and no there is no need to take turns carrying tired kids and it also provides my almost 3 year old with a comfy nap spot! I can easily push my 9 year old, 7 year old, and almost 3 year old around with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Rather disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had seen one before purchasing because it is so bulky and hard for me to get into my car. True, it is large enough and safely straps in our triplets, but I can’t handle it by myself loading and unloading. Also, I agree with the wheels issue.. not the easiest to maneuver either... kinda disappointed for the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy W. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Buy it before it’s sold out!
customer_reviews.text: What a wagon!!!!!! This bad boy is easy to move and works like magic with 3 kids 5 and under! I wish it was around when they were little!!! We use it as a wheelchair for our son who has health problems and requires to be tented. This and the rain cover are the perfect combination to keep our guy safe, be able to go anywhere in public, and still have room if sisters need to hop in too! I don’t know what we would do without it now! You will not regret this awesome wagon!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hauser

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We just received our WonderFold Wagon yesterday and I've already taken it out 4 different times between yesterday and today. It is absolutely amazing! Leaving the house with 4 kids, 4 and under is definitely a challenge and something I wasn't up for doing without my husband. Well at least I wasn't before we got this wagon. 3 out of my 4 outing have been without my husband. This thing is a serious game changer. Everyone that has seen it thinks it's so cool. I've already had three different people I know looking into buying one for them self because I can't stop talking about how awesome it is.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bonte

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded to this wagon from another stroller wagon brand and I couldn’t be happier with the W4! I love being able to move and change the set up of the seats, the extra room under the seats and having harnesses for all of my kids! My kids are 6, 2.5 and 9 months old and it’s the perfect stroller for all of them! Even with all three kids, it’s super easy to maneuver and doesn’t feel like I’m pushing that much weight around. It also fits really nicely in my van with the third row up, even better than some of our other double strollers. Absolutely would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: msandovalabq

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Only things I would change is the the height of the push bar, actually having a pull handle instead of a strap, and when I have 4 kiddos in it it is alittle hard to turn. Otherwise they did an amazing job on this thing! Kids love it and so handy and love how sturdy it is:)
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: This Wagon is EVERYTHING!!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few weeks to decide on this for my 3 grand daughters Twins that are 1 and eldest that is 2).I looked at all the options and chose this wagon because of the reviews. I am glad I did. My girls were super happy, lots of space very easy to put together. My son is 6'ft and he doesn't need to hunch over to push it, easy to move around and good on different surfaces. Fits in the car and looks great. We Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SONIA Lopez

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY-you WON’T waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS! Took it to Disney and everyone fell in love!! I loved how we can place our bags under the chairs, the zipper on the side for easy access to it without moving the kiddies. Only thing I wish it came with was the bag cover. I tried placing an order for it but they were all out of stock for W4. I don’t think it should be sold separately. But this is amazing! All in one. No more riding with 2 strollers! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Christal Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I do daily field trips with my daycare, i used to have a quad-stroller. I love how much easier this wagon maneuvers!! Pushed through snow, up hills and turns easily! Love the space to carry everything i need to take with us! Seriously, if you're on the fence, make the investment! Definitely worth it! - I also made seat covers to help keep it clean!
customer_reviews.author: William A Felsburg

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo worth it. I have twins and we use this everyday. Wheels are heavy duty, so much easier to push on a dirt road then our stroller. Also bought the mosquito net that we use camping, that was a big help, camping in Michigan.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jo Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: the wagon seems ok but with missing set belt harness i really cannot use it. i have tried to contact seller several times but nothing has come of it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: we have 3 small kids all under 3. we can fit them all in this stroller and still have room for our different bags for the boys. fold up and puts together easy and very well made. handles very well., outside or in.The only drawback so far, is that everytime we can't take it anywhere without being stopped so people can ask about it. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my three!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that there is room for an infant on the lower level of this wagon! I have a co sleeper bed or wedge pillow for the baby 🥰the children love it! Got all three a accessories for this!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Israel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! You get what you pay for—-buy it already!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow just the best best best I can’t say enough about it! It rocks my Sox, and it gets compliments from literally 84% of human beings we come into contact with... the kiddos LOVE IT TOO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Our Mutual Friend

customer_reviews.title: Best Stroller EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this wagon for about 6 months now and it is amazing. I’ve had a Keenz, and a Zoe Quad stroller before. The Wonderfold winds hands down. My 5, 4, 3, and 1 year old fit comfortably in it, and I still have room for necessities. It fits perfectly in my Honda Odyssey with all the seats up. 10 out of 10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeSauce3000

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wagon for multiples !
customer_reviews.text: Really love this wagon. Easily fits my 2yr triplets in it. The only thing is I do find the brake peddle to be in the way and hit it with my foot sometimes. Other than that, makes traveling with multiple super easy with this wagon
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting this wagon for a while for my in-home daycare and finally splurged. It is extremely good quality. Took 10 minutes to take it out of the box and put it all together. My kids love it. They really thought about everything when making it. Everything is removable for washing. The sun visor is a stretchy material that slides to wherever you want it. There’s pockets everywhere and tons of space under the seats. It fit a 4yr old, 3 yr old and 2 18 month olds perfectly. Everyone had enough seat room and leg room. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T

customer_reviews.title: So glad I ended up with the Orange one!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted the grey one but Boy am I so glad I got the orange one! Reason why? Since I bought it to take my children to school cars can easily see us bc we di stand out ALOT. I have gotten so many complements on this wagon, i love everything about it my only issue is that it's a little on the heavy side and is super big but its perfect for what I needed it for!❤
customer_reviews.author: MaggieS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wagon. Seats are easy to remove when wanted. The tires are large so getting over bumps are a breeze. I literally have nothing bad to say about it. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Mangette

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for life with 3 under 3
customer_reviews.text: We love our wagon! It’s great for walks around our neighborhood, trips to the beach/park, and even target runs! With 3 under 3 it makes life much easier to use than a cart at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Drop the keenz or veer and get a W4
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 boys under 4 and this is a life saver. When my youngest was a newborn he fit in his carseat and the wagon perfectly along with our toddlers. We fit through doorways perfectly. We owned the keenz before but we had no leg room nor room for a 3rd. This wagon has room for 4 and lots of leg room.
customer_reviews.author: carolina cruz

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about wonderfold and their products much sooner. I would not have wasted money with buying other wagons or strollers that didn't suit our family. I have 4 kids, 6 being the oldest and 15 months being the youngest. They all love the wagon and I love how much space it provides. I only wish it came with a better sunshade.
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaG-E

customer_reviews.title: Best wagon ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hands down theeee best wagon ever! My son has special needs and a lot of medical equipment so we bought the larger one and it’s the best wagon we could have bought! Definitely worth the money! This is a must! And it’s so easy to fold and to load in my suv!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Not wild about the canopy top... as mine has only been used once!!! It has small holes and unraveling. But it is a nice stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Kinzleigh's Mimi

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it. Hands down.
customer_reviews.text: If you have multiple kids buy it. Save money, raise money, whatever. Get this stroller and no other. This was a game changer for my family (2 yr old, 18 months, and 5 months). Worth every penny. I'm not a bot or a promoter. I'm just so darn happy with it. When you open it up, smells like a new car. Assembly is stupid proof. Thank you to Amazon and UPS for the quick delivery. Thank you to wonderfold for making an unbeatable product.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Dela Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Best wagon/stroller for amusement parks
customer_reviews.text: Life saver and convenient. I use it for amusement parks for my 6 year old daughter and 13 year old son. Yes both fit. One sits in chair attached and my teenager sits on bottom. It never fails I always get compliments and people who admire the functionality of it. Only thing is it is PRICY. I only purchased it because I came into money but other than that would not be able to afford this steep price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best thing for multiples!
customer_reviews.text: wonderfoldwagon 💙💗 My 18month old twins Love this wagon stroller so much!! And my 3 week old Twins are so comfy!! This is worth every penny, hands down. Absolutely love this. I can push and steer easily with on hand!! Best thing for multiples. Folds down and opens like a breeze. Love how smooth it feels. #happymommahappybaby #2setsofTWINS #momof4 THANK YOU SOO MUCH wonderfoldwagon Can’t wait to get all the accessories now 🤩🤗
customer_reviews.author: PJmedusa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WAGON
customer_reviews.text: Identical triplet girls are now traveling in comfort and style. The wagon is sturdy and has great safety features. We are delighted with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann R Ford

customer_reviews.title: Too big to love.but overall great
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great wagon. We took it to SeaWorld. One toddler and infant 6 mos both sitting. Both took naps.there. can adjust shade. Only negative is the size this thing is huge. Takes up most of our storage space in an SUV
customer_reviews.author: michael rangel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all our needs!
customer_reviews.text: We love this wagon! It meets all of our needs- space for my 5 year old and 1 year old to sit, as well as space to play! Also, the zip part makes it easy for my 5 year old with Spina Bifida to climb in and out without me having to pick her up. I love that the sides are higher so I dont worry about either child climbing and falling out. You wont regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K fox

customer_reviews.title: Mom of four! Best purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is an engineering marvel! I have two toddlers and a set of twin babies so this wagon was a must have. It was pricy but worth every penny! It will without a doubt replace every umbrella stroller and conventional stroller that I own. Also, it fits in our Honda Odyssey without the third row seats folded. Simply amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mardirosian

customer_reviews.title: If you’re interested don’t hesitate!!!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product! Makes life so much easier with multiple kids especially young ones!! Extremely stylish and the kids love it. Not you average stroller so they’re ecstatic every time they jump into it. We use it as a rolling play pen when at parks and family gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Deljanin Family

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller wagon! Works wonderfully with 3 kids. Would definitely recommend. Very versatile. Have used to take the kids many places. Great storage space. The push is a little difficult when the kids are riding right over the front wheels but it is not a deal breaker. Have used it as a play pen as well when at camp.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wagon I have a 4 year old, 1 year old and 5 month old and it's nice to have them all in one stroller versus taking two separate ones. The only thing I hope they change is the handle it would be nice to be able to just collapse it down instead of having to remove each time to load into the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 kids, worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Getting the seats on and off is a little bit difficult it you have hand weakness, but other than that folding, unfolding everything is SO easy! With 3 under 4 and one due in a month this is 100% worth it.
customer_reviews.author: bridgettfrost

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to push
customer_reviews.text: Love it To heavy to push when all kids the wagon. Wish it glide like butter
customer_reviews.author: Ameama

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for Multiples
customer_reviews.text: If you're having multiple don't buy a stroller this handles it all and doubles as a pack n' play
customer_reviews.author: Preston Arning

customer_reviews.title: Love our new stroller wagon!
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved my W4 and I already love it! It is so spacious and will last much longer than a double stroller that the kids will grow out of quickly. Im so excited to be able to use it on our weekly zoo trips so the kids can stretch out more and have a place to eat their snacks while we walk. I think they will love feeling like they have more freedom!
customer_reviews.author: johnathan weidknecht

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than you think!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 kids and lots of nephews. This is prefect for family days.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Think Twice
customer_reviews.text: 4 kids for me. 4,2, & 1 year old twins. This wasn’t an easy buy considering the price. One of those things I couldn’t imagine without now. Super sturdy and multiple functions. It’s basically a rolling pack and play. So happy I went through with the purchase on this one. No regrets for me. Disclaimer: You will get a lot of attention.
customer_reviews.author: White Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: IT EVEN FITS THROUGH DOORS!!!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite thing is this wagon. My babes LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have a child and my sister in law does it saves us from need a double stroller or bring both. It also allows us to not have to wear our diaper bags. we just put them in the bottom of the seats for storage. LOVE it would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have mAde in a long time. My wife is home right now with 3 boys, 3,2, and an infant. This wagon has made it easy for her to take them on walks, or let the infant sleep in the wagon while she plays with the other two outside. It’s awesome. We love it, the boys love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: It's a big wagon and Wich is the only reason I gave it a 4 star for Maneuverability. It's so well made and such a good investment if you have the children to fill it. Lots of Hacks for the wagon too which I love!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Frasier

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this wagon!! I have 14 month old twins and they were hating being strapped into their stroller for walks. Our favorite part so far is that they can stand and hold onto the sides during our walks!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Mertz

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think twice GET IT! My only regret is we didn’t purchase sooner. It’s worth every penny and such a life saver for outings or just daily walks
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Buy it! We will soon have 4 kids, 5 and under and it’s been a fantastic investment. The kids love riding in it and I love having them all safely contained, especially where there are crowds of people. Folds up and fits in the trunk of our mini van no problem. If you have 3 or more littles, I’d highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linette Manderfeld

customer_reviews.title: Tilts left
customer_reviews.text: It tilts left on the easiest terrain. So uncomfortable! Reached costumer service but it’s been a month since they will replace it “as soon as possible” last message they didn’t even had the decency to answer. Worst costumer service for such an expensive product!
customer_reviews.author: thenriquezc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wagon
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. Bought for our 3 yr old and he fits in it great. Get so many compliments from those who see it.
customer_reviews.author: Momof7

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love...best stroller I have ever owned dont leave home without it. way easier than a double stroller and tit all 4 of my little ones two 7 year olds one 4 years old and an 9 month old!! And still have room to put all thier stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love this wagon!
customer_reviews.text: We love our wonderfold wagon. It is heavier than your typical stroller/wagon but worth every penny. I have 3 under 3 and they love to ride around in it and it's still easy to push.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea DeSerto

customer_reviews.title: Love it and came quick
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly even though it wasn't prime. It's beautiful and great quality. Was super easy to put together. I have 4 kids under 5 and can't wait to use it this summer. I love it and the orange is such a cool color.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars times two equal ten stars! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is a beast! Long story short. I work & my wife is a full-time mom. I can't always be there in theirs appointments and help out. I no longer feel bad or worry for my wife. I DON'T regret purchasing this wagon. Thank you Wonderfold!
customer_reviews.author: Jhowmie

customer_reviews.title: We love our quad wagon!
customer_reviews.text: Didnt take long to put together and the instructions were easy to understand. Overall im so glad I bought this quad wagon for daycare. I would recommend this 4 person wagon to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: mandie

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller wagon ever!
customer_reviews.text: I just took this out for the first time with my 4 kids ages 6,4,2 and 2 months and wow us it amazing! It is a learning curve getting it in and out of my vehicle but after doing it 3 times in and out I already have a better understanding over how it will work. It handles great and I can't wait for summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh i love this thing. It's perfect. It has little cubbies&room for the kids feet &extra space i would have never thought of that is so helpful. This is the best! It fits through a single door! Folds easy&stores well in our vehicle. Thank you to whomever designed this!
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy for my kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love our wagon!! I cannot wait until it warms up to go to my nephews ball games and have the ease of taking my triplets places. A very sturdy wagon!
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wagon!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've ever made. This thing is such a great buy. I've used it so many times while grocery shopping and it also doubles as a pack and play while you are visiting somewhere that isn't baby proofed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job!
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I expected which sucks during the loading and load part of the car but comes in handy when I have all 3 of my littles and a whole bunch of stuff to carry. So I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Casi

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the best purchase we have ever made where the kids are concerned! Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mclemore

customer_reviews.title: Good for multiple kids
customer_reviews.text: Got the first one broken but they sent the new as soon as I returned the first one. It works great for us! We have 2 year old twins and a 1 year old all 3 fit great in the wagon.
customer_reviews.author: bernal quinonez

customer_reviews.title: The best kid investment!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express enough how much I love this wagon. My kids love it more! We use it daily and it is perfect for our family!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: WONDERFOLD W4 4 Seater Multi-Function Quad Stroller Wagon with Removable Raised Seats and Slidable Canopy, Orange
product_meta.description:
Color:Orange| Item Package Quantity:1Make every moment matter with WonderFold Wagon, the multifunctional stroller wagon for all ocassions.

Stroller certified and thoroughly tested, our products are designed to keep your little ones safe and secured.

Weight capacity: 300 lbs total

Rear basket limit: 11 lbs

Per set of seat limit (2 seats per set): 66 lbs
feature_bullets: GREAT FOR OUTDOORS – Baby bags. Booster seats. Strollers. Sometimes, taking our little ones on the go with us is nearly impossible! Luckily, our heavy-duty WonderFold Multi-Function Four Passenger Wagon is travel-friendly and carries up to 300 pounds. With high face to face seats, this stroller wagon holds up to 4 toddlers and makes it easy to take the entire family to the park, beach, campsite, and more!

DURABLE & COLLAPSIBLE – Our user-friendly design makes this wagon easily foldable with minimal assembly required. The one-step folding design allows you to fold and store your WonderFold Wagon in seconds. All seats can be easily removed to transform the stroller wagon into a utility wagon perfect for sports equipment, camping gear, and luggage.

SAFETY HARNESS AND PUSH HANDLE – Our wagon is designed with 5-point safety harnesses, a front zipper door for children's easy access, and a deep carriage with mesh panels for increased ventilation. When little ones are in the basket, the user-friendly push handle makes it easy to keep an eye on them while you're on the move.
CANOPY & COMFORT – This wagon comes with a slidable and removable UV protected canopy for ultimate comfort in various weather conditions.

SAFE & REPUTABLE – Our easy one-step foot brake keeps this wagon safe by securely locking rear wheels while it's idle. Plus, heavy-duty 8-inch front wheels with suspension and bearings and 10-inch rear wheels make for smooth maneuvering and comfortable rides. Our tires never require pumping, making this U.S. Patented collapsible wagon the hassle-free solution to your travelling woes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars462 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
